name: Baffin Young Eiger Winter Boots - Children to Youths
description: When they follow you everywhere – through slushy parkades to trekking snowy trails in Kananaskis Country – these technical winter boots do an awesome job of helping them keep up and keep warm.Uppers are ripstop nylon with seam sealed, waterproof construction.Velcro® closures at ankle and mid-leg for secure fit and easy removal.Separate toggle closure at top collar keeps snow out.Plush multi-layer liner is removable and provides extra warmth and comfort.Midsoles and lower shells are made of flexible and lightweight thermoplastic rubber.Lugged thermoplastic rubber outsoles are integrated with Ice Paw pads for traction on slick terrain.
